TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BluetoothSocketException extends Java.IO.IOException

Docs.summary: Thrown when an error occurs during a Bluetooth Socket related exception.

remarks.para: Thrown when an error occurs during a Bluetooth Socket related exception.
This is currently intended to be thrown for a failure during BluetoothSocket operations.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype Android.Bluetooth.BluetoothSocketExceptionReason code) cil managed

Docs.param: : error code representing the reason for failure.
Docs.summary: Create a BluetoothSocketException with an error code.

remarks.para: Create a BluetoothSocketException with an error code. A generic error message is generated based on the code provided.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype Android.Bluetooth.BluetoothSocketExceptionReason code, string msg) cil managed

Docs.param: : error code representing the reason for failure.
: Custom error message associated to the failure.
Docs.summary: Create a BluetoothSocketException with an error code and custom error message.

remarks.para: Create a BluetoothSocketException with an error code and custom error message.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
